website_summaries.verdict: Bragi's The Headphone is one of the more affordable cable-free Bluetooth earphone pairs available, but you'll still get more for your money by going the traditional wireless route.
pros: Easier to operate than most cable-free earphone pairs
cons: Included silicone eartips don't allow for strong bass response
Charging case doesn't include a built-in battery

website_summaries.verdict: An innovative product on multiple levels, the Bragi Dash is a truly cable-free wireless earphone pair that doubles as a fitness tracker.
pros: Powerful audio performance with solid bass response
Protective case is also a charger
cons: Inaccurate heart rate measurements in testing
Ambient room monitor has a slight delay

customer_reviews.title: True freedom
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. High quality sound. Good Bluetooth distance. Low charging time to play period. (1hr charge - 5-6hr play) light weight, stays in my ear when working out. Love the noise cancellation feature, let in sound or choose not to. Worth it, just don't lose them lol.
customer_reviews.author: Efo

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the negative reviews. Headphones dead on arrival. They only work when inside the charging case and the second you remove them they turn off. The battery will not hold any charge whatsoever. Shocking for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 headphones, but of them only worked when they were in the dock charging.
customer_reviews.text: Don't take a gamble with these, they have serious hardware issues and the big majority don't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: FadiNg

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless earphones for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Original package that came didn't work , they had a problem charging.I returned the package, and the replacement had no problems and was working fine ,
customer_reviews.author: Giannis

customer_reviews.title: These are actually very comfortable buds and aside from a few usability issues
customer_reviews.text: Beware of Bragi and their quality. These are actually very comfortable buds and aside from a few usability issues, i'm impressed. Unfortunately my case broke and after a week of talking to support they "sent" me a new one. It's been three weeks with no sign of the new one. I had a similar issue with the original Bragi Dash and support sent me a poorly packaged replacement without the charging cable or custom eartips that they required i send back to them when i sent the device in for repair. When they finally sent those back to me weeks later, they were in a plain envelope and had been through hell. I have since moved onto different buds.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: You've been BRAGI-ed!
customer_reviews.text: My third pair - NONE of them work properly. Dead Left phone, snap, crackle and pop with constant disconnects in the pair that "works". Bragi Support is sympathetic but there is NO consistent fix for these. (I also have a Dash which has given constant problems). Good idea F***ing AWFUL execution. I note that Bragi has got out of the headphone business. Good riddance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice to use
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice to use, you just have to be aware of their limitations. First off, the fit will be a little uncomfortable initially. When you press any of the buttons on the Bragi, the unit is pushed further into your ear causing slight discomfort. This lessens over time as the buttons become more malleable but it can also be circumvented by using the comply earbuds that come with the unit. The only unfortunate thing about those is they don't last a terribly long time; 5 months at most. Replacements can get rather expensive...
customer_reviews.author: jalex

customer_reviews.title: These work great. They hardly ever lose connection and they last ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They hardly ever lose connection and they last about 6 hours of play time. I'm really happy with them. There's definitely some compromise with the built quality of the box, but the headphones have a great finish.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas sandller

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Broken out of the box. Have not been able to get them to even turn on. Fully charged and led lights up in the charger but nothing once you take them out of the charging cradle. Have had NO LUCK with Bragi customer service. No response.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Freer

customer_reviews.title: Product is defective.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The first pair I received left earbud would not connect no matter how much troubleshooting from other users or from the manufacturer. The earbuds were replaced and neither earbuds would power on except when in the charging cradle. Gave up on these and returned the second pair. Good luck to anyone willing to take a chance on these.
customer_reviews.author: Drewkrew

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great earbuds...with one drawback.....make a charging case that will supply several charges for the buds, like 99% of the other bud makers already have! At $150, there should be no question....
customer_reviews.author: karl

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment and nice packaging! And to be honest - these headphones have one of the best sound qualities I have listened to so far. I’ve already tried a couple of wireless earbuds in this price segment but these ones are clearly in the top 3. Awesome work, Bragi! :)
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Item didn’t accept charge or work at all. I’ve returned for a refund , costing me another $24 which it seems will not be refunded . Not sure that they are genuine product. . Complete fail.
customer_reviews.author: James Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work right out of the box. Right headphone blinks intermittently forever and won't respond to button presses. Customer service (after a week of waiting) says "poke the contact pins with your fingernail, this fixed it for some people." Requesting refund. Avoid this imitation.
customer_reviews.author: Getwhatyoupayfor

customer_reviews.title: good sound, comfortable, left doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound, very comfortable, but the left bud does not work. Bought my first set from another retailer. Left bud did not work from the very start. Followed instructions from Bragi customer service. No go. They wanted me to send it to them, but I chose to return it to the store for a full refund. I really like the comfort and sound so I bought it again this time from Amazon. Once again the bud will not work. Returning this one. There is a bad pattern here. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Yogendra

customer_reviews.title: Not working !
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got this product it seemed to be charged so I tried to pair to my phone. Did not work what so ever. So I figured I’d charge it ti Full battery then try again. They said it’s supposed to take 80 minutes for a full charge. They charged all night and all the next day and the right headphone will not charge fully nor will it even try to pair. Straight trash.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even work upon arrival, read into it and discovered it was a very common issue. (One side barely working)
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Voller

customer_reviews.title: These thing suck. I’ve tried everything to get them to work.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got this product it seemed to be charged so I tried to pair to my phone. Did not work what so ever. So I figured I’d charge it ti Full battery then try again. They said it’s supposed to take 80 minutes for a full charge. They charged all night and all the next day and the right headphone will not charge fully nor will it even try to pair. Straight trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but it didn’t work for me. Read why!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but didn’t work for me. I returned not because was bad but it doesn’t stay in my ears. Because I trained BJJ for many years my ears’s concha is completely mess up. Yes, I’m found another set that “really” stay in even when I’m running and sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Barros Family

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed i got these brand new and the left earbud was not making any sound. This apparently is a common issue i checked the forums and tried all the possible workarounds. They all seem to be lucky inconsistent attempts to kick it back into gear. Mine after working on it all day still doesn’t work. I hate dealing with returning purchases for a refund. But paying $40 to deal with this is an issue for me. If it is for you reading this. I wouldn’t give it a try. Don’t buy these. I hear their other dash headphones have a ton of common issues too. Not worth.
customer_reviews.author: Hector j Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds stop working shortly after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend not buying this product. I purchased these ear buds and one ear bud stopped working after only a few months. Worse yet, the company Braggi, is nearly impossible to contact for customer complaints. Do not buy these ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The left earbud stopped working after a month and it looks like it’s too late to return. Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: IK

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: I had the Dash and really liked it until it stopped working a few days ago. Ordered this ones and arrived DOA. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Fropo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: I didn't heed the advice of the other reviewers and thought I'd try my luck - because survivorship bias is a thing, right? But nah, The Headphone arrived defective. The right earbud would not charge, and would not turn on. I wish Bragi would retroactively name these "Bragi - Probably Not the Headphone" because the consistency and quality control just isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like these headphones. I am not an audiophile, but they sounds good to me. The one major issue I had was that the earbuds that came with the headphones broke after only one week of use. Therefore, I am using a new pair of earbuds that I created from a pair of ear plugs I had in the house. Since I've been using the new earbuds these work great. The critical step in using these, is getting a good seal in your ear. This will make the sound overall louder and the base much deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Looked online and this seems to be a widespread problem
customer_reviews.text: Just got the headphone today and cant get it to work out of charger (only right works in charger). I am able to turn it on while in case but turns off when out. Only the left ear bud light stays on. The right doesn't stay lit after over 3+ hours of charging. and the right dosent blink constantly. All the contacts are fine and pins move up and down with ease. They knew what they sent me. Wouldn't buy. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher kayne fennell

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: First set I ordered did not work at all. Returned and received a second pair and only one side worked. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne Ryan

customer_reviews.title: So stoked! Thats the next level!
customer_reviews.text: So stoked, never had something in my ear that fit so well. Love the sound. Was a bit afraid of the pairing process since i am not a techy, but its so easy and does it actually by itself after first use. Thats the next level!
customer_reviews.author: Peter L.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Stays in well but didn't really like how deep into the ear canals it has to go. The sound was average at best and a little tinny. The case is pretty big and doesn't have a built in battery like the competition. These might adequately meet your needs but there are better options out there that should be considered first.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Five Stars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my wife to replace a pair of broken a earpods. They fit great in her small ears and don't let her look stupid. She really likes the headphone and the sound of it. Best present i made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Left earphone stopped working after a few months - common issue that they've not resolved
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment - the left earphone used to just stop working when a charge was needed, but now it just never works even when it shows fully charged. It can't communicate with the right earphone which is what is required for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 hours of owning my first pair the right bud sounded like a whisper while the left was at normal volume. Tried everything I could think of to fix it until I gave in and got a replacement pair thinking it might've just been those. A month after using the second pair the same problem occurred seemingly randomly. Extremely disappointed as they are very convenient and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Vargas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible headphones. Left earpiece stopped working. Sent it back stopped working again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pichardo

customer_reviews.title: Left side doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets. Both came with the left bud not working. These are trash don't waste money. Would rate them less if I could
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Losing sound in one earbud if you switch rubber tips for another type of tip.
customer_reviews.text: If you switch the rubber tips to another type of tip, be prepared to lose around in one of the earbuds. I exchanged them and the same result happened again.
customer_reviews.author: cbatgold

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds not working on first day
customer_reviews.text: Worst experience ever Got the item on time But when I tried it out for the first time, there was no sound on the left earbuds and spent the next few hour online on forums Google and Amazon trying to fix this issue Why are you selling a product that don't work This is worst than china earbuds I bought on taobao called x2t
customer_reviews.author: Wayxlox

customer_reviews.title: both ear buds wont connect
customer_reviews.text: brand new and both ear buds wont connect and the one that does wont stay connected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont'n waste your money
customer_reviews.text: terrible product first pair didn't work I received a replacement pair was the same don waste your money with this product there are better options.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Left Piece never wanted to work
customer_reviews.text: Only the right ear piece work . Tried every possible way to reconnect and reset the Bluetooth setting and still didn't want to work
customer_reviews.author: erradi a radi

customer_reviews.title: solid buy
customer_reviews.text: the fit was really good and the sound was clear. It wasn't as full as I would have liked it to be. the battery is quite good as advertized
customer_reviews.author: Technerd87

customer_reviews.title: They stop working too soon
customer_reviews.text: The right earbud stops working and it will not charge. I only had them for 3 months and barely used them. Amazon will not refund and I have to contact the manufacturer which is a waste of my time. Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.Loaiza

customer_reviews.title: Great! Transparency feature is the best!
customer_reviews.text: They work really well! Walked across my house and they stay connected to my iPhone 6. Sound good when playing Tidal master quality, and ok with Apple Music also. Battery life could always be better, but they will last several hours on a charge. Fit is good and I can wear them while I run. I'm really happy with them and love the transparency feature. I use it all the time because it allows me to hear around me but doesn't affect the music quality or volume.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bills

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Only one earbud worked. No way to fix it. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Julius

customer_reviews.title: POOR SOUND QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: The sound coming through the so-called "The Headphone" is just too faint, that it's barely audible. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Judge GLENN

customer_reviews.text: Left earphone failed I asked for a refund... Luckily it's possible
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kadosh

customer_reviews.title: Did not charge
customer_reviews.text: Headphones did not charge, very disappointed. Returned and buying a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these buds. Battery life is excellent and now noise blocking is great (I can barely hear my mower when I do yard work). I also travel a lot and the transparency feature is great to be aware of your surroundings but still listen to your tunes. Also, props to Bragi customer service. Lost my charging case two weeks after I bought them. Pretty sure at Denver airport TSA. They didn't sell the charger (this was April so they may now). Contacted Bragi and once I sent them proof of purchase they happily sent me a replacement at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: It vary bad
customer_reviews.text: Before it come i try and dont work it very bad i very feal bad about that
customer_reviews.author: Kasidej

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in ears
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable in ears, well designed, easy to use, pleasant to touch. Sound is ordinary for inear headphone. Fullsize headphones have much higher sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even turn on
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I needed headphones and they won’t even turn on. I charged them for 12 hours
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Fields

customer_reviews.title: Great in ear headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't make up my mind on buying these Bragi headphones or the bragi dash. Big difference in price between the two, but I went ahead and purchased the Bragi headphones. I'm completely happy with them! I haven't had any connectivity issues or pairing problems. They work perfect and fit in my ears. They will come with different sizes of the soft ear insert so most likely you'll find one with a perfect fit. Sound was great also. I've used "Beats" before and of course these smaller in ear head phones won't have the pounding bass of beats, but the bass and sound is still great in my opinion. Great product from Bragi. Thumbs up! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Just lowered to 1 star. the left earbud is now not working. At this price I would not expect them to break so soon. I am very gentle with these headphones so they did not break from any abuse. VERY DISAPPOINTED! Original review 3 Stars: Disappointed that there is no way to know the power level. I have cheaper wireless earbuds that give you an audible tone when they are getting low. The Audio Transparency function is not noticeable at all, I'm still not sure what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST truly wireless Bluetooth earbuds on the market! Better than Bose, Beats & Apple! Thank you for such a magnificent device!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Juncker

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality and setup all worked out great. The biggest issue I ran into that lead ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and setup all worked out great. The biggest issue I ran into that lead me to not use them at all was one main thing: the position of the buttons on the earbud. It is positioned such that every time you try to use it (turn it on, receive or make a call, change the volume), you're jamming the earbud into your earlobe. Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr N

customer_reviews.title: The bluetooth signal isn't great but acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Volume is my biggest complaint. The bluetooth signal isn't great but acceptable. Like almost all other headphones in this category, the bass is weak (not as bad as I was expecting though). Buttons on the right headphone aren't nearly as uncomfortable when pushed as other reviews claimed (IMO).
customer_reviews.author: Ben A.

customer_reviews.title: i would recommend buying additional foam peices with order
customer_reviews.text: Have no real issues with the headphones only wish the sound could be louder but im probably going deaf anyways and the the foam ear peices ..after a few weeks of use both foam inserts have torn which is expected it is only foam after all ..i would recommend buying additional foam peices with order
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones just work
customer_reviews.text: These headphones just work. Does not have any of the connectivity issues of the Dash. Great alternative to the Apple Air Pods.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Jones

customer_reviews.title: The transparency feature is really cool too. These are better than others I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Left earphone doesn't cut out the way most others do. They sound decent enough and stay in your ears without issue thanks to the design/shape. The transparency feature is really cool too. These are better than others I have tried. I have an iPhone but have not tried the earpods because they look unfathomably stupid.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: I love the bragi the headphone but I also have a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the bragi the headphone but I also have a problem they are not working properly they are not charging at the same time the left headphone stops charging in less that a minute I just received them today I was just able to used them for around 30 minutes and they stop working how can I have this solve?
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Alan Gimenez

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality was not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was not as good as expected...but I still love them and they work. They have good Bluetooth connectivity. I have never tried the airpods but these are nice because they are in-ear. Silicone tips make my ears really itchy inside but I liked the memory foam tips (unfortunately expensive to replace and only lasted a month).
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Arenson

customer_reviews.title: good, but..
customer_reviews.text: probably a one-off, but mine can't connect to more than 1 device, oddly enough. I can't switch seamlessly between laptop and phone, because the Headphones won't appear as discoverable on the other unpaired device. I would have to reset the Headphones to re-register but even then I can still only pair with one device at a time forever. Yeah, it's annoying enough that 2 stars off the rating is fair.
customer_reviews.author: Jordy

customer_reviews.title: I got a $50 pair that sound better than this
customer_reviews.text: volume is not loud at all. I got these for working out. they don't stay in my ear that well and the volume is so low that Its hard to hear my music. I got a $50 pair that sound better than this. other than that they pair easily and don't really cut out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Max Volume is way too low and right speaker stopped working after 6 months of rare use.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Souder

customer_reviews.title: Lacks high volume but otherwise good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great simple earbuds. Nothing fancy. They just work. Very sweat proof. Only drawback is lack of volume. They could definitely be louder for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Mendez

customer_reviews.title: These are a wonderful set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are a wonderful set of headphones. They are not nearly loud enough to sate my lust for heavy metal while I am working out, but during cardio and listening to music at work these are more than perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ver Mulm

customer_reviews.title: Left headphone not pairing to the right...
customer_reviews.text: So far a terrible experience... Tried to pair to pixel XL, right one is working, left one completely silent and no sign of even trying to pair as of yet... Going to fully charge though I've tried the trick where you clear the headphones memory of all devices by dropping the right one in and holding the power button for 5 seconds without that working. For $150 I'd expect a flawless product. UPDATE: Bragi sent out a new pair for me after a somewhat cumbersome exchange with customer support and the new pair seems pretty good so far, loving audio transparency, the headphones themselves are very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: erin antici

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase. Defective earbud.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Father's Day. The right earbud no longer works. Extremely disappointed. & b/c I bought it early, I'm no longer eligible for a return. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jennyblue111

customer_reviews.title: I had a bad experience I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: They were really good the first two weeks, for some reason the right ear headphone stoped charging making the left ear useless. Also, your ears hurts when you touch the control bottoms, the price and idea was good but it needs work.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: These are great wireless earbuds that don't look like you have antennas ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to the AirPods, and I settled on The Headphone after extensively researching other options. These are great wireless earbuds that don't look like you have antennas sticking out of your ears. They are very easy to pair, and in fact they pair with up to four different devices! I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth for swimming? Keep tripping
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth doesn't work at all on the water... forget about ir on swimming
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas F. K. Heine

customer_reviews.title: Always defer to Apple, lesson learned
customer_reviews.text: As a headset they are fine. As a means to communicate with people via your phone, not great. People couldn't hear me most of the time to the point I don't use them in that function anymore. A colleague had the new Apple product and I tried them. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: Neil McAdam

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Do. Not. Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Terrible company. On my second piece of defective headphones and they refuse to refund my money. Takes weeks to get in touch with anyone from Bragi. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy The Headphone NOT The Dash. Trust me.
customer_reviews.text: Let me hopefully save you some time and money between choosing Bragi The Dash vs Bragi The Headphone. I've owned both earbuds and I loved The Headphone so much that I returned them and purchased the, more expensive, Dash version. Thinking that the gesture controls would be awesome along with the battery charging case. Well after reviewing them for a week The Dash is trash. They do not harold the same strong connectivity of The Headphone. A set of Bluetooth earbuds that actually NEVER skip while in my shirt pocket while running. So after returning The Dash I've now purchased The Headphone again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, good signal connection to my phone. Picked these up while they're still around in anticipation of my original Dash eventually breaking down. Note that Bragi appears to have exited this business, so purchasing is a bit more of a crapshoot if you don't trust the quality already. Warranties likely will not be honored. If you're looking for a bare-bones dash replacement to carry over until a decent alternative product hits the market that isn't either a: price-inflated or b: garbage, these will do.
customer_reviews.author: Jcto

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt even tell you how bad they were
customer_reviews.text: I would like to write a review on these. However as soon as I got them in and went to charge them up for the first use. They wouldn't even charge. Great quality control for $100 pair of headphone. Decided not to even seek a replacement pair if they couldn't even work out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cat D

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is the detriment
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit my ears like I expected, but they do stay in. The quality of sound is very good, but when you have tendencies to run spur the moment or when you can’t be connected to power right before your run, the lack of an on/off switch overrides any other feature. They’re typically dead before I get started on a run and I haven’t been able to connect them to my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: robbydek

customer_reviews.title: work well, not 100% perfect
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. Downside is that the case doesn't charge the ear buds like some others do, but those are also about $100-$150 more. They pair easily with Ipad and Iphone, but having trouble pairing to PC.
customer_reviews.author: PNWNatureLover

customer_reviews.title: Simplified and does its job well for daily use
customer_reviews.text: These do the job well as NFMI performance is good. There is no extra battery in the case and no touch controls, but fit my ears really well. You can take the silly neck strap off. Much better than the more expensive model as these do the job of true wireless headphones without useless bells and whistles which dont work. Only wish that the headphones turn off when put in the case. The sound quality isnt great but is usable in city environment.
customer_reviews.author: Jong Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love these.  Gonna upgrade for even more features.
customer_reviews.text: I love these little earbuds. Once you get the hang of it they are awesome. It takes awhile figure out exactly how much pressure is required for the buttons to register your command. If you push too hard, your ear might get sore after awhile. The foam tips they include worked great for me and there are several tips for you to try and get the best fit. After several months of use, I am going to upgrade to the new dash. I mostly use these when I'm getting my hands dirty, so it will be nice not to have to wash my hands every time I need to use the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: MRoss

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth head phones buying extra memory foam makes them ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bluetooth head phones buying extra memory foam makes them fit snug without hurting your ears and are really clear sound there is nothing like these that I have found I would love to try out the dash pro version
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: They don't work.
customer_reviews.text: The left earbud does not connect and produce any sound. I researched and saw that this is a known problem. The manufacturer suggests some fixes but none of them worked.
customer_reviews.author: mervrx

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: This device is defective due the fact every time I set the device to audio transparency it will switch on and off of the audio transparency. I have to reset it every few minutes. DEFECTIVE! The sound sounds covered on either setting.
customer_reviews.author: marlo brinnon

customer_reviews.title: Cool, that’s it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s something to brag about haven’t- hence the bragi name. But the headphone cuts out more than usual, the sound is not loud for me and the features lose its coolness after long. Do not lose them, you may want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Klorthoe

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work out of the box and company apparently can take up to 6 months to replace even if its a warranty issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tai_effects

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Left earbud stopped syncing and here are no ...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Left earbud stopped syncing and here are no steps to re sync. Bragi makes the customer pay shipping for returns.
customer_reviews.author: faed

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for amount spent
customer_reviews.text: These never worked correctly from day one. The sound quality is not great. It stopped charging the left earbud only after having them one month
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low volume  earbud.
customer_reviews.text: OK, the sound was a little above average bass was present, not mind blowing....highs and mids we're good though. Volume was on the low side!! They stay connected indoors and outdoors. And Fit my ear very good. One thing I noticed when pressing the buttons on the ear buds you have to press really hard sometimes and it was discomforting.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Kingdom

customer_reviews.title: and Bragi's support is very very bad. For the price that they're charging
customer_reviews.text: The product is faulty. The left earbud's LED works intermittently, and Bragi's support is very very bad. For the price that they're charging, I would expect this to work flawlessly. As it stands this is the last item I would ever purchase from Bragi.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Michael Tan

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds work well but case design is awful
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 3 days. Out of the box, I couldn't hear anything out of the left ear piece. After charging it, I was able to hear out of both ear pieces. But then the metal stick that attaches to the case and the strap pushed though and is now stuck inside the case and the strap has nowhere to attach. That seems like a a bad and cheap design. I'm hoping Amazon will help me get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: thelilprincess

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed and poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Basically, this product appears to have been manufactured without quality control or adequate testing. I returned mine. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, TERRIBLE. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Same absolutely terrible Bluetooth connectivity as their terrible Bragi dash. Do NOT buy either the Bragi dash or the Bragi headphones. A terrible waste of money. They should be ashamed to release either of these buds.
customer_reviews.author: E M

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging and missing accessories
customer_reviews.text: I received these headphones in damaged packaging, and the Foam Comply Tips were missing, so the headphones didn't fit correctly. This prevented any positive experience with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaben Nanlohy

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on these
customer_reviews.text: I had the original dash product at $500 at start product worked very well after a while problems with charging, was never able to get online updates one unit had software issues and would not work customer support is non existent it can not be repaired when you have an issue they offer 10$ coupon towards new pr these were only 8 weeks old they would not even exchange or try to repair units toss them and buy new pr was their reply great idea great design crap service, and trouble shooting
customer_reviews.author: somfy

customer_reviews.title: Never buy Bragi
customer_reviews.text: After buying the original Bragi Dash, I would recommend everyone to never buy anything from this company. Awful products. Mine never even works now, completely useless, and Bragi support is crap.
customer_reviews.author: James H

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, Bluetooth never fail on me (don't understand ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, Bluetooth never fail on me (don't understand why people complain about it Bluetooth?? ) Securing in my ears when exercise. Didn't get it from Amazon but highly recommend this for audio quality
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: BRAGI HEADPHONE ONLY DISAPPOINTS,POOR BLUETOOTH,NO APP.POOR SOUND,NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing the Bragi headphone 5 weeks ago, total disappointment The sound level is so low that you can hardly hear the music at its highest volume, the right-hand side earphone keeps dropping the signal, the Bluetooth connection keeps dropping out. Contacted Bragi customer services four weeks ago, still waiting for an answer, along with around 100 others by the looks of their customer support feed. Not worth the money, returned and purchased a set of other true wireless earphones. Better value for money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bourne

product_meta.title: Bragi H-1000 The Headphone
product_meta.description:
Meet The Headphone. Smooth sound, bangin’ bass and up to 6 hours of battery life.

 Bragi, makers of the world’s first Hearable, has designed a product that makes it easy to connect to any Bluetooth device to stream music or communicate. With The Headphone you enjoy high quality, wide-bandwidth audio, free from wires.

 Use The Headphone as a Bluetooth headset to accept or place phone calls. An algorithm combines the signals from an internal EarBone microphone as well an external microphone for crystal clear conversations. 

 Control The Headphone with three small buttons on the right side. You can start, stop, change the current song or move to the next/previous one with the main button. Turn on Audio Transparency to hear the world around you. Launch your smartphone’s voice assistant by holding the main button for 1 second. 

 Listen all day long with battery life up to 6 hours of play time. When not in use, put The Headphone in the CarryCase, which can hang from a convenient neck strap. 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




No Wires. No boundaries. Connect The Headphone to any Bluetooth device for crystal clear stereo sound all without the hassle of wires. With Knowles Balanced Armature Speakers The Headphone delivers a rich, dynamic stereo experience anywhere, anytime.

Get connected. Stay connected. Communicate over your network of choice hands free. No need to worry about windy days and heavy traffic. With VersantTM advanced voice technology from Knowles, hold hands-free phone conversations even in the most challenging conditions




Insert Place The Headphone in your ears. Try the three different FitTips for the PerfectFit. The different FitTip sizes mean a comfortable, secure fit and incredible sound quality. 

Get Started To enter pairing mode, hold the O button for 3 seconds until you hear the pairing sound. Select BRAGI HP from the Bluetooth options on your device. 

Play. Connect. Enjoy. Experience rich, dynamic stereo sound anywhere, anytime. Silence the world, or let it all in. Take your music on an adventure. 




Designed to live in your ear The Headphone comes with three different FitTip sizes which guarantee PerfectFit. 2 pairs of FitTips (S/M) and 1 ComplyTM Foam Tip (one size fits all) provide a comfortable, secure fit without having to make any adjustments. By partnering up with ComplyTM, Bragi offers you the best sound experience for your Headphone, so you can enjoy your favorite music. 




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Play. Connect. Enjoy.

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We wanted to build a product for people who enjoy freedom. Freedom of sound. Freedom of choice. Freedom of movement. That’s what The Headphone is all about. We want people to enjoy what makes them feel free and happy. The Headphone does this with smooth sound, bangin’ bass and the longest battery life of any such product on the market.

What makes your product special?

The Headphone is the first truly wireless earbud to provide amazing battery life, high acoustic quality and Bluetooth capabilities that first-generation Hearables have struggled with. We also rethought the interaction, putting buttons on The Headphone, for customers who prefer tactile interfaces. 

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

From the first day of our Kickstarter to 2014, to present day, we’ve been driven by the support of thousands who believe in our vision of a wireless world. Bringing The Dash and The Headphone to life and having the opportunity to share them with this fanbase has been an incredibly intense, rewarding and beautiful experience.
feature_bullets: Wireless. The Headphone delivers rich, dynamic stereo sound and hands free communication, all without the hassle of wires.
Play. Stream audio, switch between songs, answer phone calls, and give voice commands, without having to look at a smartphone.
Connect. Pair with any Bluetooth-enabled Device.
Enjoy. With up to 6 hours of wireless play time, you can enjoy the Headphone all day long.
Audio transparency. Silencer the world, or let it all in. Be with yourself or with your music.
